reviewText:
... the 1932 version, it should have the 1932 poster image, and not the one from 1924 version, as seen now.
And, for the 1924 movie info, the casting is completely different except for director Duvivier, and since it's silent all right, it can't be the 1932 movie.
And since IMDB is a subsidiary of Amazon, they have no excuse for mixing infos (far from being the first time, but it seems to become a rule that, when regarding movies with identical titles, they'll almost every time give the info related to another version)
